body.description: Mario Badescu Hydrating Glow Toner with Jojoba & PHA A revolutionary fusion of facial skin care products that will transform your beauty routine. Our innovative formulation combines the goodness of a hydrating skin toner and the potency of a facial serum, working in perfect harmony to reveal your skin's natural luminosity. Discover the quenching essence of our hydrating serum, meticulously crafted with Jojoba Seed Oil and Sodium Hyaluronate. Our Hydrating Glow Toner is crafted with 92% natural ingredients, making it the essence of clean beauty. This essence toner caters to every woman's needs, making it the ideal hydrating toner for face. Whether you desire a milk toner to enhance your skin's natural glow or an exfoliating toner for a smoother, more youthful appearance, our product is your ultimate solution.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Mario Badescu Hydrating Glow Toner with Jojoba & PHA A revolutionary fusion of facial skin care products that will transform your beauty routine. Our innovative formulation combines the goodness of a hydrating skin toner and the potency of a facial serum, working in perfect harmony to reveal your skin's natural luminosity. Discover the quenching essence of our hydrating serum, meticulously crafted with Jojoba Seed Oil and Sodium Hyaluronate. Our Hydrating Glow Toner is crafted with 92% natural ingredients, making it the essence of clean beauty. This essence toner caters to every woman's needs, making it the ideal hydrating toner for face. Whether you desire a milk toner to enhance your skin's natural glow or an exfoliating toner for a smoother, more youthful appearance, our product is your ultimate solution. INGREDIENTS HIGHLIGHT Red Algae Extract Vitamin E Jojoba Seed Oil Sodium Hyaluronate

HOW TO USE: After cleansing, apply to skin with a cotton pad. Wipe gently in outward motions until the pad comes up clean. If product gets into eyes, rinse thoroughly with water. DUAL-ACTON BRILLIANCE Experience the power of a face toner and face serum in one potent formula, working together to enhance your skin's natural luminosity like never before WHY WE LOVE IT Enhances your skin's natural glow. An exfoliating toner for a smoother, more youthful appearance CRUELTY-FREE, NATURAL CARE, PARABEN FREE

Mario Badescu Drying Lotion Mario Badescu Super Collagen Mask, 2 Oz Mario Badescu Acne Facial Cleanser Mario Badescu Rose Hand Cream with Vitamin E What It Does This is the original, award-winning on-the-spot solution. Renowned for its ability to help dry up surface blemishes overnight, our iconic Drying Lotion continues to reign as a best-selling favorite amongst beauty editors, Celebrities & professionals. Hydrate and smooth dry, dull complexions in need of a lift. This classic collagen and clay mask is designed to help improve skin’s elasticity while delivering moisture to reveal a firmer, more youthful-looking complexion. Deep clean and clarify oily, troubled skin. Formulated with, Thyme Extract, and a soothing botanical blend, this daily face wash boasts exfoliating properties that help break down impurities and encourage a balanced, healthy-looking complexion. Softens, smooths and replenishes dry hands. Infused with rose and enriched with Vitamin E, this light fast absorbing hand cream envelops skins in a veil of comforting moisture. Nourishing oils condition skin and help reduce the look of dry lines. Key Ingredients Isopropyl Alcohol, Aqua (Water, Eau), Calamine, Camphor, Sulfur, Zinc Oxide, Talc, Glycerin, Salicylic Acid, CI 77891 (Titanium Dioxide) Collagen, Oatmeal, Red Algae Extract, Kaolin, Zinc Oxide Salicylic Acid, Thyme Extract, Aloe Vera and Chamomile Extract Rose, Vitamin A, Vitamin E, Wheat Germ Oil and Glycerin

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Wonderful product! Keeps skin toned and glowing.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This has been great. It took me a bit to get used to the smell, but it works well.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Fragrance is unnecessary, otherwise nice for a toner
reviews.reviewText: ✅Likes:○ Easy to dispense, better nozzles than other toners I've had in this sense○ Hydrating, yes. Glycerin is nice. Cooling effect○ Not overly runny/watery for a toner, could double as a serum❌Dislikes:● Fragrance! Potential irritant that I avoid due sensitive skin, surprised they found this necessary for a toner! Granted, it is an unusual and kind of nice fragrance though. Can't pinpoint what it is but it clean seeming but also seems like it could totally be a bottled lifestyle fragrance, could be unisex probably which is nice. Strength is about a 6 out of 10, does dissipate slightly when you spread on skin but still there● Slightly stings sometimes● Not necessarily bad but I do notice a faint shimmery iridescence which is unexpected/odd!● Slightly tacky finish

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Lightweight and effective
reviews.reviewText: Love this entire line of products. Good toner, I use it daily

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Best toner I’ve ever had. Skin feels hydrated and rejuvenated. Will definitely recommend and buy again. 10 stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 21, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love Mario products and the price 😍

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works as well as other brands
reviews.reviewText: Reasonably priced product. I swith from Mederna. As good or better.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I have used Chanel Sublimage Lotion for several years..this is even better. Instantly hydrates my skin and gives a glow.
